ygData.subject: RE: Re: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: As stated before, there is more to playing a warrior than attack/kick/bash/taunt,  just as there is more to playing a cleric than heal/root/damage/heal.  If
ygData.messageBody:
As stated before, there is more to playing a warrior than
attack/kick/bash/taunt, just as there is more to playing a cleric than
heal/root/damage/heal. If you want to make suggestions to improve the
warrior class, thats good. But please stop with the drivel about there is
nothing to playing a warrior. Most people who play a warrior past the
newbie stages will disagree with you (otherwise they wouldn't be playing the
warrior anymore).

Angarth Bladedancer, Warrior of the 21st Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> When it comes down to a battle, the Warrior's job is to choose the correct
> critter to attack/kick/bash/taunt. Thats about it. A good Warrior will
> make the best choices here. A good Warrior will switch targets many times
> in a battle, distributing his attacks and taunts to keep the spellcasters
> free from attack. Some of the best Warriors will switch armor/weapons
> based
> on what monster they are fighting. Some go even as far to switch a shield
> in and out in the middle of battle depending if they are getting hit or
> not.
>
>
